reviews.text: One of the best Pizza Huts in the area. First folks in so the buffet wasn’t completely out yet. Though the food that was, was absolutely delicious & hot. Staff was friendly & on top of things. Restaurant was pretty clean & well organized.
SO so ummy...and I love supporting young readers -- thanks, Hut! ...did I mention how very yummy the pizza was? Seriously. Good pizza 🥰
Love their pizza! It's the best anywhere. The service at this one is amazing, too!
Food was good and so was the service. Waitress was great also!
Pizza hut has been always the best pizza and love the salads and sauces. Great services as well.

Mid segment India n restaurant near to lake area. For Indians it has good options and worth. Price is moderate. I tried this during my  many visits. People are good. Lot of Indians and Pakistanis can been seen here. Places location is great. Need to improve ambience and overall service, quality and taste standards. Wash rooms need refurbishement.

it was terrible. servers are arrogant. they did not give me even a cup of water. whenever i asked them several times, they just stand on chairs and kept their eyes on their phone. it was lunch time on weekdays. they didn't not busy. there was 3 servers and only 3 groups of customers. is it an excessive demand? when he gave me a cup of water, he slammed that. the water splashed on table. but he just went out without any apology for his rudeness.
It's closed Permanently. Anyone looking for Indian food, please find another place
food is ok...not completely indian taste....Saturday buffet is goo choice
The administrator lady is very rude. She goes to kitchen without uniform. We tried to ask her why but the answer was: It is not your bussiness.The vodka quality is very bad (we had Beluga on friday).
Been there many times during my 4-month stay in Almaty.  Nice place but bit expensive in terms of Almaty.

Great look and atmosphere
Discovered to late but definitely coming back
